text: James Scott "Jimmy" Connors (born September 2, 1952, in East St. Louis, Illinois, also known as "Jimbo") is an American retired tennis player. He was the World No. 1 tennis player. He won the Australian Open, Wimbledon and the US Open. He was coached by Pancho Segura. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:American tennis players Category:Australian Open champions Category:Living people Category:People from East St. Louis, Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Illinois Category:US Open (tennis) champions Category:Wimbledon champions Category:World No. 1 tennis players
title: Jimmy Connors
